title: Evaluate Lease vs. Buy Decision
description: A business client needs help deciding whether to lease a new warehouse or buy one. The agent must prepare a comparative analysis.

tasks.description: Gather the financial inputs for both scenarios: lease rates, purchase price, loan terms, operating expenses, tax assumptions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary data for the analysis.

tasks.description: Create a 10-year cash flow projection for both the leasing and buying scenarios.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates detailed cash flow models for both options.

tasks.description: Prepare a summary report comparing the net present value (NPV) and long-term implications of each option to help the client decide.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers a clear, data-driven report to facilitate the client's decision.
